detail_desc: Cropped vest top in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a slight sheen.

Wellingtons with print motifs and appliqués. Loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Short dress in an embroidered crêpe weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short, wide sleeves with a drawstring to create a draped effect. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Scalloped edges around the neckline and hem. Partly lined.
